section.name: Pumping Streams
section.p: The Scalax.IO library provides the >>> or pumpTo methods for dumping a reader/inputstream into a writer/outputstream
section.source: val readerResource = ManagedResource(JavaConversions.readerStream(new jio.StringReader(input))) val writer = new jio.StringWriter() val writerResource = ManagedResource(JavaConversions.writerStream(writer)) // Make sure resources are opened and closed properly by executing inside a for-expression for (in <- readerResource; out <- writerResource) in >>> out
